summary: An oil prospector is captured by a violent and primitive cannibal tribe in the Philippines' rain forest, but he manages to escape with a female hostage and tries to locate his missing companion and their airplane in order to return home.
cast: Massimo Foschi|Me Me Lai|Ivan Rassimov|Sheik Razak Shikur|Judy Rosly|Suleiman|Shamsi
title: Mundo can√≠bal, mundo salvaje
